title: csync update failed - session error string 501
body:
moved here : https://github.com/owncloud/mirall/issues/193


hi !

i've encountered 'csync update failed' for quite a long time now on my debian with the latest owncloud an client...

here's the log :

```
11-27 10:02:15:680 >===================================== sync started for  "owncloud"
11-27 10:02:15:737 csync.statedb - sqlite3_compile error: no such table: metadata - on query select count(phash) from metadata limit 1 offset 0;

11-27 10:02:15:738 csync.vio.main - capabilities: unix extensions: 1
11-27 10:02:15:738 csync.api - module does not need time synchronization.
11-27 10:02:15:738 #### update start #################################################### >>

11-27 10:02:15:738 csync.updater - .csync_journal.db excluded
11-27 10:02:15:738 csync.updater - closing walk for /home/user/systeme/owncloud with read_from_db 0
11-27 10:02:15:738 csync.api - update detection for local replica took 0,00 seconds walking 1 files.
11-27 10:02:15:738 csync.util - memory: 262884k total size, 43056k resident, 32244k shared

11-27 10:02:15:738 csync.owncloud - opendir method called on owncloud://***/remote.php/webdav/sauvegarde
```

hopefully you'll be able to help me :)

all the best 

t.
